╭── ​ᓚᕠᗢ NattyUI Named Colors Support ──╶╴╴
│ 
│ NattyUI supports a series of named color values, such as those supported by
│ Kitty.
│ 
│ ╭── 𝒊 Note ──╶╴╴
│ │ Not all terminal emulators support true-colors.
│ ╰────╶╴╴
│ 
│   aliceblue           ghostwhite                mistyrose     
│   antiquewhite        gold                      moccasin      
│   aquamarine          goldenrod                 navajowhite   
│   azure               gray                      navy          
│   beige               green                     navyblue      
│   bisque              greenyellow               oldlace       
│   black               grey                      olivedrab     
│   blanchedalmond      honeydew                  orange        
│   blue                hotpink                   orangered     
│   blueviolet          indianred                 orchid        
│   brown               ivory                     palegoldenrod
│   burlywood           khaki                     palegreen     
│   cadetblue           lavender                  paleturquoise
│   chartreuse          lavenderblush             palevioletred
│   chocolate           lawngreen                 papayawhip    
│   coral               lemonchiffon              peachpuff     
│   cornflowerblue      lightblue                 peru          
│   cornsilk            lightcoral                pink          
│   cyan                lightcyan                 plum          
│   darkblue            lightgoldenrod            powderblue    
│   darkcyan            lightgoldenrodyellow      purple        
│   darkgoldenrod       lightgray                 red           
│   darkgray            lightgreen                rosybrown     
│   darkgreen           lightgrey                 royalblue     
│   darkgrey            lightpink                 saddlebrown   
│   darkkhaki           lightsalmon               salmon        
│   darkmagenta         lightseagreen             sandybrown    
│   darkolivegreen      lightskyblue              seagreen      
│   darkorange          lightslateblue            seashell      
│   darkorchid          lightslategray            sienna        
│   darkred             lightslategrey            skyblue       
│   darksalmon          lightsteelblue            slateblue     
│   darkseagreen        lightyellow               slategray     
│   darkslateblue       limegreen                 slategrey     
│   darkslategray       linen                     snow          
│   darkslategrey       magenta                   springgreen   
│   darkturquoise       maroon                    steelblue     
│   darkviolet          mediumaquamarine          tan           
│   debianred           mediumblue                thistle       
│   deeppink            mediumorchid              tomato        
│   deepskyblue         mediumpurple              turquoise     
│   dimgray             mediumseagreen            violet        
│   dimgrey             mediumslateblue           violetred     
│   dodgerblue          mediumspringgreen         wheat         
│   firebrick           mediumturquoise           white         
│   floralwhite         mediumvioletred           whitesmoke    
│   forestgreen         midnightblue              yellow        
│   gainsboro           mintcream                 yellowgreen   
╰────╶╴╴
